advancements.sculkevolution.pandoras_box: Unlock an Umbra Vault using a Warden Key, then face the consequences
advancements.sculkevolution.handheld_cat: Reach the Sickle's maximum damage cap without taking any damage yourself
Releases a sonic boom at the cost of all the sculk built up by the sickle.
enchantment.sculkevolution.soul_lunge.de: Uses a small amount of the sickle's built up sculk to dash forward.
enchantment.sculkevolution.hemostasis.de: Can be used to heal a small amount of health, at the cost of the sickle's sculk. Can also be used as bone meal while crouching.
enchantment.sculkevolution.repulse.desc: Prevents the sickle from losing most of its sculk when hit, at the cost of a cooldown. Also prevents sculk loss from Echo Chamber.
